## mmm update

Updates all managed mods

```
mmm update [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help             help for update
  -v, --version string   Minecraft version to update mods to
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
  -C, --cwd string   changes the current working directory
```
